plot: A young bride with haunting nightmares is sent to the magical healer to protect her pregnancy from a hidden curse. When her husband's family rejoices in healing, her past comes back to threaten her unborn baby.
title: Kofja e Zbrazet
plot_es: A young bride with haunting nightmares is sent to the magical healer to protect her pregnancy from a hidden curse. When her husband's family rejoices in healing, her past comes back to threaten her unborn baby.
plot_en: A young bride with haunting nightmares is sent to the magical healer to protect her pregnancy from a hidden curse. When her husband's family rejoices in healing, her past comes back to threaten her unborn baby.
